<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Quicken Heartbeat](/Feats.aspx?ID=1229) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadows](/Sources.aspx?ID=29) pg. 74</row>

**Archetype** [Golem Grafter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=39)

**Frequency**
once per turn

**Prerequisites**
[Golem Grafter Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1227)

</column>

---

You’ve replaced your heart with one made of animated quicksilver and living adamantine. You reduce your [slowed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) condition by 1. Alternatively, if you are not slowed, you are [quickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32) during your next turn, and can use your extra action to Stride or Strike.
name: Quicken Heartbeat
